overall_assessment.reasoning: Strong theme extraction from 31 feedback documents. All major pain points identified with proper attribution. Minor confidence reduction due to limited historical data for trend analysis.

theme_assessments.severity_justification: 45% occurrence rate, sentiment -0.85, multiple explicit statements about inability to complete orders
35% occurrence, sentiment -0.82, increasing trend noted in recent feedback
Direct revenue impact, orders failing to submit, order values $160-$13,788 affected
23% occurrence, increasing trend, impacts core ordering workflow
theme_assessments.review_focus: Validate whether scroll position issue is new or longstanding

theme_assessments.severity_justification: Lower occurrence but high friction, may be under-reported
theme_assessments.review_focus: Check support ticket volume to validate occurrence rate

trend_analysis.validation_needed: Compare to previous month data to confirm trend direction
Need 90-day historical comparison for statistical significance

coverage_gaps.impact: Minor - edge case issues not reaching theme threshold
coverage_gaps.recommendation: Review uncategorized items for emerging themes next analysis cycle
Run analysis against previous quarter data for trend validation

assumptions_made.assumption: Feedback is representative of overall user base
assumptions_made.reasoning: VOC data comes from users who chose to provide feedback, may over-represent frustrated users
assumptions_made.risk_if_wrong: May overweight negative themes vs silent satisfied users
assumptions_made.validation_needed: Cross-reference with NPS survey data for sentiment calibration

assumptions_made.reasoning: Some feedback touches multiple themes, assigned to primary theme
assumptions_made.validation_needed: Consider multi-label classification for future analyses

assumptions_made.assumption: Sentiment scores accurately reflect customer emotion
assumptions_made.reasoning: Automated sentiment analysis may miss sarcasm or nuance
assumptions_made.risk_if_wrong: Theme severity rankings could be miscalibrated
assumptions_made.validation_needed: Manual review of 10% sample for sentiment accuracy

score_improvement_recommendations.recommendation: Include 90-day historical comparison for all themes
